name: Lifarm
description:
Farm sim, where your life is currency and you must fight monsters to plant another day! Should you keep ❤️ for the next fight? Or should you invest them into plants for some health later?

Try to get the biggest highscore highlife!

Controls:

WASD/ ARROW KEYS  -  move
SPACE  -  shoot and plant
ENTER  -  finish planting and FIGHT
1/2 - switch between different plants
Aim using your mouse.
You will automatically pick up plants ready for harvest.

Plants:

1. You will need 2 ❤️ to plant the green plant. After 1 fight you will be able to harvest it for 3 ❤️.

2. The blue plant is much larger and will require 3 ❤️. It will also grow longer - 3 fights. But it will give you 10 ❤️!
